title: Communications pertaining to the Anti-Defamation League and/or Jonathan Greenblatt (New York City Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. All records from between October 6, 2023 through the date the search is conducted (including but not limited to emails, memos, reports, documents, and any other written or recorded communications) which mention, reference, were sent to, or were received from the Anti-Defamation League, and/or its employees/officers including Jonathan Greenblatt.

2. All records from between October 6, 2023 through the date the search is conducted (including but not limited to emails, reports, documents, and any other written or recorded communications) which contain or link to any of the following URLS or subdomains of these URLs: ADL.org, twitter.com/adl, x.com/adl, twitter.com/adlisrael, x.com/adlisrael, twitter.com/JGreenblattADL, x.com/JGreenblattADL, twitter.com/ADL_NYNJ, x.com/ADL_NYNJ, twitter.com/ADL_Tracker, x.com/ADL_Tracker, facebook.com/adlorg, or instagram.com/adl_national.

3. All records from between October 6, 2023 through the date the search is conducted (including but not limited to emails, memos, reports, documents, and any other written or recorded communications) which mention, reference, were sent to, or were received from the email domain adl.org, the email address jgreenblatt@adl.org, or any other email address associated with the Anti-Defamation League and/or Jonathan Greenblatt.

4. All records from between October 6, 2023 through the date the search is conducted (including but not limited to emails, memos, reports, documents, and any other written or recorded communications) which were sent to persons or organizations representing, or received from persons or organizations communicating on behalf of, the Anti-Defamation League and/or Jonathan Greenblatt.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Thomas McKay

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any agreements related to the sales or distribution of beverage on campus, athletics venues and facilities.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kelly North

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Florida squatting correspondence
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All e-mail communications (including complete email chains, email attachments, calendar invitations, and calendar invitation attachments) between a) the office of Gov. Ron DeSantis and b) the individuals listed below that c) contain the term "squatting," "squatters," or "transient occupants," and d) were sent or received between 1/1/2023 and the date this request is fulfilled.

b) 
Any personnel of the National Rental Home Council with email suffixes @rentalhomecouncil.org
Megan Fay, Megan@CCCFLA.com
Maicel Green, maicel@cccfla.com
Nick Iarossi, Nick@CCCFLA.com
Ashley Kalifeh, Ashley@CCCFLA.com
Ron LaFace, Ron@CCCFLA.com
Jared Rosenstein, Jared@CCCFLA.com
Scott Ross, Scott@CCCFLA.com
Chris Schoonover, Chris@CCCFLA.com

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Rebecca Burns
